column14: I have been using this solid shampoo for about a month now. The actual formulation is really great. It is not drying or moisturizing and does not weigh hair down. It does exactly what it says it will do: volumize. The scent is extremely mild (and I typically avoid products with any fragrance) and pleasant. My only real complaint, and it's mild, is the bar itself: I hate the shape. Sure, it's pretty and it's fine to hold, but I don't think the shape is ideal to rub on your head. I MUCH prefer the usual round shape, which all other shampoo bars use. I am guessing someone designed this convoluted shape to differentiate it from all the others, but in my opinion this bizarrely shaped (although aesthetically pleasing) bar isn't an improvement. That said, I'd still recommend this low-waste, efficient, effective shampoo. I have tried quite a few of them, over a long period of time, and hands-down, this one is BY FAR the best.
